label: logicA:ecology_en
steps: [1] If a floodplain wetland is restored, nutrient retention in the watershed increases.
[2] If nutrient retention in the watershed increases, downstream algal blooms decrease.
[3] For any species x, if x is a top predator, x regulates herbivore populations.
[4] The gray wolf is a top predator.
[6] Nutrient retention in the watershed increases (from [1] and [5]).
[8] The gray wolf regulates herbivore populations (from [3] and [4]).
[9] Downstream algal blooms decrease and the gray wolf regulates herbivore populations (from [7] and [8]).
